PageTitle: nexthop recursive-lookup restrain disable (BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view)
FuncDef:
The nexthop recursive-lookup restrain disable command disables BGP recursion suppression in case of next hop flapping.
The undo nexthop recursive-lookup restrain disable command enables BGP recursion suppression in case of next hop flapping. The nexthop recursive-lookup restrain disable command disables BGP recursion suppression in case of next hop flapping. The undo nexthop recursive-lookup restrain disable command enables BGP recursion suppression in case of next hop flapping. By default, BGP recursion suppression in case of next hop flapping is enabled.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view,BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view,BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv6 address family view
